profile.name: Candidate Name
profile.profile_summary: Experienced Junior Security Engineer with commercial experience in MS Sentinel, Microsoft Defender for Cloud, Windows Server, Active Directory, and Windows. Skilled in handling security alerts and incidents, with a strong knowledge of IT security protocols.

experience.title: Junior Security Engineer
experience.description: Commercial experience in MS Sentinel, Microsoft Defender for Cloud, Windows Server, Active Directory, and Windows. Handling security alerts, incidents, and ensuring IT security protocols compliance.

profile.strengths: The candidate has all the required skills and the necessary experience for the job. The candidate's location also matches the job location.
profile.areas_for_improvement: The candidate does not have any listed education, languages, or certifications, which might be important for the job.
profile.improvement_suggestions: The candidate should consider adding information about their education, languages, and any relevant certifications. They should also consider adding more details about their experience with the required skills.

job_requirements.years_of_experience: At least one year of commercial experience as a Junior Security Engineer or similar role.

template_recommendations: The candidate should highlight their skills and experience in the 'skills.tex' and 'employment.tex' sections of the template. They should also consider adding a section for education, languages, and certifications, if applicable.

optimization_suggestions.skills: Highlight the required skills in the 'skills.tex' section of the template.
optimization_suggestions.experience: Provide more details about the experience with the required skills in the 'employment.tex' section of the template.
optimization_suggestions.education: If applicable, add a section for education in the template.
optimization_suggestions.languages: If applicable, add a section for languages in the template.
optimization_suggestions.certifications: If applicable, add a section for certifications in the template.
